summary:
Nazeem the shamed now sits in best place for his mammoth cheese mouth.
He wont be making it to the Cloud District for a while...
descriptionHtml:
The Citizens of Whiterun have decided to band together and bring an end to Nazeem's disruptive presence in the market, commenting on everything you do and flaunting his little wealth.

Nazeem the shamed now sits in best place for his mammoth cheese mouth.

UPDATE: You can now marry his wife.

Life in Whiterun has improved immensely and the citizens are happy.
His cell sits right under the small bridge when you enter Whiterun.
A note and key is on a table of his valuables free for the taking. (The note is the official eviction notice)
PLEASE ENDORSE

POLISH TRANSLATIONÂ 
[color=#ff0000][size=5]Polskie tłumaczenie
[/size][/color]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64208/?

IF YOU WOULD RATHER HAVE HIM PUBLICLY DISPLAYED DEAD HERE IS MY OTHER MOD
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50774
author: Darnell Nugget
